It appears to be a very safe campus.
I'm not sure if there are any greek life activities.
There many types of student clubs and activities.
Yes, I believe it is great for many types of students.
I don't have any unusual traditional experiences at the moment, but I look forward to some in the future.
This is an affordable junior college for inner-county resident as well as inner-state residents. There programs are partnered with many of the universities.
There are many after class activities and concerts.
There dining hall appears to be very good.
Off campus living
Academics is at the forfront for each students needs.

This is a very informative college that has the best interest of the student in mind. I enyjoyed visiting their campus and the staff are very helpful. I believe they have the students geared up for every educational challenge.

textAfterTable: Will learn a lot I know that i will learn a lot at PG because of the support of my counselors and professors. Already I have made lasting relationships with some of the recruiters Login to rate or flag the reviews George from New Carrollton, MD 05/29/2012 Reviewer is A past student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 90 Categories Comments Campus Safety The campus is very safe. The students aren't there to look for trouble just to learn and have fun. The campus police are always on Patrol especially in the parking lots. Greek Life There is no greek life. Alcohol is not allowed. Clubs and Activities There are so many events on campus. The school always have events, performances every week. One of the biggest events is The Global Cafe and Battle of the Sexes.
